attributes.action: Consider Headgear for all Pedal Cyclists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having experienced the loss of our 36 year old Son during March 1999. My wife and I  strongly urge that safety helmets should be made mandatory for ALL cyclists.

Many children ride pedal cycles on pavements and sometimes cause accidents by running into pedestrians. 

If we want to protect our children from danger, we must make it law that when people ride pedal cycles, they must wear appropriate protective headgear, regardless of age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
